Calculations for a sankey relationship pair

Source: R/plot_sankey.R
dot-sankey_relation_pair.Rd

Get matched values to compare from the giotto object. Comparison columns are then passed as a data.table to .sankey_compare to be calculated.

Usage

.sankey_relation_pair(g, gsp, rel_idx, node_idx_start = 0)

Arguments

g

giotto object

gsp

giottoSankeyPlan object

rel_idx

index of relation pair in gsp

node_idx_start

starting index to assign new nodes

Value

list with 1. node names and 2. data.table with cols source, target, and value

On this page
